item.title: /home/nkallergis/bio/experience
item.description: Senior Consultant at Network to Code November 2021 - present For the past couple of years, Iâ€™ve been working as a Network Automation Engineer, helping customers transform their teams and network operations. A blend of networking, automation/orchestration, telemetry, and Python/Django development. Professional services architect at UniSystems November 2019 - November 2021 As a result of the below and in conjunction with the experience I’ve gathered from all my previous positions, my title was changed to “Architect”.

item.title: /home/nkallergis/bio/projects
item.description: MacStadium Telemetry June 2023 - September 2023 Migrate from a commercial monitoring solution to an open-source telemetry and alerting stack (Nautobot, Telegraf, Prometheus, Grafana, AlertManager). Bank Central Asia Network Automation January 2023 - May 2023 Joined the Network Automation team of BCA and helped design their automation strategy. As part of that, managed to push Nautobot to production, deliver a catalog of services to business stakeholders, and set the basis for automated data center deployment.
